name: Linked Robots
description:
A bug in the program drives all the robots of the Tech&Co company crazy. The player is one of the survivors and must find a solution to restore the situation. He has to repair each of the robots while avoiding losses as much as possible.

A game made in 48 hours with Unity and Aseprite.

Use arrow keys to move. R to restart. S to skip. Q to quit.

There are 13 levels.

Credits:
